name: broken sniper joe
description: A broken sniper joe. Much less threatening now that it lies limp on solid ground. Could be gutted for parts.

name: broken met
description: A broken met. Much less threatening now that it lies limp on solid ground. Could be gutted for parts.

name: destroyed cyborg
description: This is a heavily damaged cyborg, composed of a previously dead human, several bionic upgrades, and some limiters and control systems.

name: destroyed heavy cyborg
description: This is a heavily damaged cyborg, sturdy in it's construction, with many pieces of extra hardware attached, and a thick steel skin, covering it's advanced electronics and life sustaining systems. It it's current state, this cyborg is probably less man than machine.

name: destroyed advanced cyborg
description: A sturdy mechanical body, with little in the way of organic matter visible. It has what appears to be segments of power armor grafted to its skin and steel frame, with cybernetic augmentations protruding.
